attributes.action: Build prisons in africa for uk prisoners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Use some of the vast amount of cash we give to Africa to build prisons there to house U.K. prisoners.The benefits are cheaper to build prisons,it creates more prison places,creates work and jobs for Africans,is budget neutral as the money comes from cash we give away.Everybody wins.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
